articles.title: Greetings to Gabonese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Gabonese President

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Ali Bongo Ondimba, president of Gabon, on August 10 on the 51st anniversary of its independence.
					
					Kim in the message sincerely wished the Gabonese president greater success in the work for the national unity and the country's prosperity, expressing belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop.

articles.title: Greetings to Indonesian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Indonesian President

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, president of the Republic of Indonesia, on Tuesday on the 66th anniversary of its independence.
					
					Kim in the message wished the Indonesian president greater successes in his work for the development and prosperity of the country and the people's welfare, expressing belief that the excellent friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop in the future.

articles.title: Greetings to Indonesian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Indonesian FM

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to his Indonesian counterpart Raden Mohammad Marty Muliana Natalegawa Tuesday on the 66th anniversary of its independence.
					
					The message expressed the belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop in line with the common interests and wishes of the people of the two countries.

articles.title: Vietnamese Defence Ministry Delegation Here
articles.content:
Vietnamese Defence Ministry Delegation Here

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- A Defence Ministry delegation of Vietnam headed by Deputy Minister Lieut. General Nguyen Chi Vinh arrived here by air Tuesday.

articles.title: DPRK Female Weightlifter Wins Gold Medal
articles.content:
DPRK Female Weightlifter Wins Gold Medal

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK player O Jong Ae came first in the women's 58kg category weightlifting event at the 26th Summer Universiade going on in China on August 15.
					
					She won a gold medal by lifting a total of 220 kg, 95 kg in snatch and 125 kg in jerk.

articles.title: 25th Pyongyang International Invitational Table Tennis Tournament Opens
articles.content:
Pyongyang International Invitational Table Tennis Tournament Opens

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The 25th Pyongyang International Invitational Table Tennis Tournament was opened with due ceremony at the Table Tennis Gymnasium in Chongchun Street in the DPRK on August 16.
					
					This annual event brought together players from China, Russia, Mongolia and the DPRK (groups A and B). They will compete in men's and women's team events and men's and women's singles and doubles from August 16 to 19.
					
					Present at the opening ceremony were Pak Kyu Hong, director of the Rungrado Guidance Bureau who doubles as chairman of the Table Tennis Association of the DPRK, officials concerned, etc.
					
					An opening address was made to be followed by men's and women's team events.

articles.title: Construction of Folk Park Makes Brisk Headway
articles.content:
Construction of Folk Park Makes Brisk Headway

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The construction of the Pyongyang Folk Park has made brisk headway in the DPRK, making its future appearance clear.
					
					Seen in the area for the exhibition of historic relics are models including those of mausoleums of King Tangun, King Tongmyong and King Wang Gon, etc.
					
					Also standing there are models of many grand monumental edifices including the Mansudae Grand Monument, the Chollima Statue, the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Party Founding Memorial Tower, the Arch of Triumph, the International Friendship Exhibition House, the West Sea Barrage and Okryu Restaurant.
					
					The construction of at least 60 objects associated with the Korean people's wisdom and talent is progressing at a rapid tempo in the area of folk village.
					
					Government agency, Buddhist temple, military officer's house, house of a civil servant, military camp and 99-roomed house dating back to the period of Koguryo and Pyongyang noodle restaurant and Kimchi shop dating back to the period of the Ri Dynasty, etc. look just like what they used to be in the past. Frame projects for a palace of Palhae and buildings of Koryo Songgyungwan Academy have been completed.
					
					Such projects as the construction of sites of archery, shuttlecock game, Korean wrestling and resting places and restaurants have also been wound up.
					
					Innovations are reported from the construction site in the area for comprehensive education in history.
					
					Meanwhile, projects for the pavement of a ring road and the construction of water supply and drainage networks and other projects are also making brisk headway.

articles.title: Puppet Shows Contribute to Children's Intellectual Development
articles.content:
Puppet Shows Contribute to Children's Intellectual Development

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Puppet Company has created nearly 100 puppet plays and given more than 9 740 performances.
					
					Among them are many-act, two-act and one-act plays and puppet plays like "The Bell Does Not Ring", "Footprint of Rabbit", "Garden Balsam", "Kind Heart of Third Son", "Un Dong" and "Pig Ate Stone" which are based on stories told by the three brilliant commanders of Mt. Paektu -- President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					
					The puppet play "Diligent Man and Idler" was awarded the Bucharest City Prize at the 3rd International Puppet Play Festival held in Romania in August Juche 54 (1965). 
					
					The company's productions of different themes are conducive to children's intellectual development and entertainment.
					
					The company celebrated its golden anniversary on August 13.

articles.title: Fish Farming Proves Successful in DPRK
articles.content:
Fish Farming Proves Successful in DPRK

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has taken measures to develop fish farming for the improvement of the people's living.
					
					The Fish Farming Management Bureau of the Ministry of Fisheries has stepped up the construction of dozens of breed-fish grounds and fish farms throughout the country and the reconstruction of the Pyongyang-based Tudan Breed-Fish Station on an expansion basis, while finding out more spots suitable for fish farming.
					
					Many large and minor hydraulic power stations and waterways have been constructed in the country, offering good conditions for developing fish farming on a large scale.
					
					Kujang, Poman and many other fish farms have built microorganism grounds and earthworm habitats to provide natural feed.
					
					The Fish Farm Management Bureau has raised fishes growing rapidly with less feed and sent their fries to fish farms. It has also collected and hatched spawn in a scientific and technological way.
					
					Hwan Song Il, head of the Fish Farm Management Bureau, told KCNA that the bureau has made good results in collecting spawn of grass-eating fishes and sent many fries to fish farms and rivers throughout the country. 
					
					Fish farming has become scientific and intensive in the country, he added.

articles.title: Stone Sculpture of Koryo
articles.content:
Stone Sculpture of Koryo

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The Korean people have a long history of stone sculpture.  
					
					Their stone sculpture made a progress in the period of Koryo, an ancient state of Korea (918-1392).
					
					In Kaesong City there are some pagodas and monuments erected in the period.
					
					Typical of them is the monument belonging to the Ryongthong Temple.
					
					The monument, propped up by a turtle, is patterned with phoenix and flower on both sides. 
					
					The dragon head at the ruined royal palace in Manwoldae is another excellent sculpture dating back to the Koryo period. 
					
					A stone coffin unearthed in Kagok-ri, Jangphung County has a cover patterned with two fairies taking to the air, flower and bird, edged by blue dragon, white tiger, red bird and mythological turtle symbolizing the God of the North.
					
					The stone sculpture offers a glimpse of the Korean people's wisdom and talent.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms Dialogue and Peaceful Means Only Solution to Dispute
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms Dialogue and Peaceful Means Only Solution to Dispute

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Moves of India and Pakistan to improve their bilateral relations proved once again that dialogue and peaceful means are the only solution to dispute and this has become a worldwide trend.
					
					Minju Joson Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					The paper recalls that talks were held between the new foreign minister of Pakistan and the Indian foreign minister and a joint statement was issued at the end of the talks in New Delhi on July 27.
					
					It goes on:
					
					The foreign ministers of the two countries, in the joint statement, announced measures for building mutual confidence as regards the issue of Kashmir, a source of protracted serious friction between the two sides, and agreed to allow citizens of the two countries to enter their respective countries via the demarcation line drawn in Kashmir.
					
					India and Pakistan are expected to further talks over the issue of expanding mutual friendship and confidence including the issue of increasing varieties of trade goods in the days ahead. A particular mention should be made of the fact that both sides agreed to hold talks for taking measures for nuclear confidence in Islamabad, Pakistan in September this year.
					
					The two countries have gradually understood that no issue would be solvable without dialogue. They have opted for the overall resumption of dialogue including the talks between the ministers of Home Affairs and the talks between the secretaries of Defence, beginning with the talks between the secretaries of Foreign Affairs of the two countries since February this year.
					
					The recent foreign ministers' talks can be viewed as part of the process for the resumption of dialogue between the two countries.
					
					Secretary of Foreign Affairs of India Rao at a news briefing held at the end of the talks between the foreign ministers of the two sides said: "We have to do a lot of work, but we have already determined to go ahead in the future."
					
					Commenting on this, foreign press reports said the recent talks were different in quality from the previous ones and this indicates that the India-Pakistan relations have been definitely put on a new orbit.

articles.title: KCNA on U.S. Undisguised Patronage of Japan Keen to Realize Its Wild Ambition for Overseas Expansion
articles.content:
KCNA on U.S. Undisguised Patronage of Japan in Latter's Ambition for Overseas Expansion

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Department of State officially announced its stand that the East Sea of Korea should be marked as "Japan Sea"
					
					This has lashed all Koreans into fury as it is an act of shielding Japan's moves for overseas aggression and seriously hurting their self-respect.
					
					As known well worldwide, the designation of East Sea of Korea is the name of the sea used by the Koreans for a long period.
					
					Our ancestors got a profound knowledge and understanding of the East Sea of Korea, while exploring it from ancient times, and they were the first to designate the sea as the East Sea of Korea.
					
					These facts are recorded in historic documents of Korea including "The Chronicles of the Three States" and on the monument to King Kwanggaetho tomb built in 414.
					
					Since the 13th century, the Western geographers and explorers have designated the sea between Korea and Japan as the "Orient Sea" i.e. "East Sea" on world maps and called it "sea of Korea".
					
					The name of the sea was distorted owing to the Japanese imperialists' military occupation of Korea though its designation was used by Koreans throughout their history spanning thousands of years and universally recognized.
					
					Reflected in the designation of "Japan Sea" is a bitter history of the Korean nation, a nation deprived of sovereignty.
					
					The Japanese imperialists occupied Korea after fabricating the "Ulsa Five-point Treaty" in 1905. They got the International Hydrographic Organization registered the East Sea of Korea as "Japan Sea" by abusing the position of being a suzerain state in 1929.
					
					The historic facts go to clearly prove that the designation of "Japan Sea" is a criminal designation the usage of which was forced by the Japanese imperialists in the period of their military occupation along with their occupation of Korea and a product of their policy for militaristic expansion.
					
					The U.S. has supported Japan in its moves to designate the above-said sea as "Japan Sea" before the general meeting of the said organization to be held next year, disregarding stark historical facts and data and international usage and principles governing dominion and designation of seas. By doing so, it is fanning up Japan's ambition for territorial expansion which has become more undisguised from the outset of the new century.
					
					The U.S. stand on designating the above-mentioned sea as "Japan Sea" reminds one of the "Taft-Katsura Agreement", a brigandish document as it provided a legal guarantee for the Japanese imperialists' occupation of Korea 106 years back.
					
					Japan turned Korea into its colony by force of arms in the last century by dint of the above-said agreement. Because this agreement provided Japan with favorable international conditions and environment for converting Korea into its colony.
					
					This unreasonable behavior of the U.S. encouraging Japan in its overseas expansion, oblivious of the lesson taught by history, will not escape world public criticism.

articles.title: Ulji Freedom Guardian Kicked off
articles.content:
Ulji Freedom Guardian Kicked off

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet belligerent group kicked off the provocative Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises targeted against the DPRK across south Korea on Tuesday despite the strong protest and denunciation of the people at home and abroad.
					
					According to the newly revised and supplemented scenario for a war against the north, modern war hardware including nuclear attack means and more than 30 000 troops of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces, and commands of army corps, fleets and flying corps and above and troops of various services under them of the puppet army, 530 000 troops of huge aggressor forces in all, have entered into exercises for invading the north simultaneously.
					
					They hurled even some satellite forces which had fought during the Korean War as part of "UN forces." 
					
					By starting the above-said saber-rattling they once again brought to light their belligerent and ugly colors as the very ones talking about peace but preparing a war while whetting sword behind the scene.
					
					They would be well advised to bear in mind the resentment of the army and the people of the DPRK and their resolution to retaliate against them are running high. They are fully convinced that if a war breaks out on this land, they will lose only the Military Demarcation Line and gain the national reunification, the cherished desire.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises under Fire

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Papers Tuesday in bylined commentaries slam the U.S. and south Korea for kicking off the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises for aggression today.
					
					The exercises are scheduled to last till August 26. The U.S. and south Korea claim that the exercises are aimed to "cope with and thwart threat" from someone. But, this is little short of openly declaring that they would escalate military confrontation on the Korean Peninsula, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					The development proves that the exercises are a drill for an all-out war against the DPRK and largest-ever nuclear test war in the light of the means and scale of forces involved in them and their program and nature.
					
					What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. warmongers are contemplating forming a joint task force with the 20th Support Command of the U.S. Army as the principal axis. The Command carried out the duty of detecting and destroying WMDs in Iraq. They also mull staging war exercises of "eliminating" nuclear facilities in the DPRK under the simulated conditions of an actual war. 
					
					The south Korean conservative forces make no scruple of plunging all the Koreans into a war disaster to realize their ambition for invading the north in collusion with foreign forces, Minju Joson notes, and goes on:
					
					The Ulji Freedom Guardian clearly proves that the dialogue touted by the south Korean authorities is nothing but a cynical ploy to mislead the public opinion.
					
					The DPRK is ready for both dialogue and war. The south Korea and U.S. should immediately stop the joint military exercises, though belatedly.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Racket Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Racket Slammed

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean police authorities recently made public the "results of joint investigation" which said that the "hackers of the north illegally attacked the on-line game program of the south". They spread the conspiratorial story of the "north's cyber terrorism", saying that "a lot of north hackers are active in a third country, using IP."
					
					Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					The story of the "north's cyber terrorism" floated by the south Korean police is a sheer fabrication and no more than a plot hatched to slander the DPRK and justify anti-DPRK confrontation racket.
					
					The south Korean conservative authorities blamed the north whenever there occurred "cyber terrorist" cases in the past. But they were proved to have been done by those in south Korea or by the intervention of a third country. South Korea has thus become the laughing stock of the public at home and abroad.
					
					Cyber terrorism has nothing to do with the DPRK.
					
					The puppet Ministry of Defense is stepping up in real earnest the preparations for cyber warfare while setting up cyber command and training many experts to attack the DPRK with cutting-edge technological means in case of "contingency" under the pretext of coping with someone's "cyber terrorism." The puppet group illegally hacked Internet websites of the DPRK overseas at the outset of the year.  As seen above, the south Korea authorities are the kingpin of cyber terrorism.
					
					If they want the improved inter-Korean relations, they should stop at once such sordid farce and behave with reason.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stop Suppression of Reunification Activists
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stop Suppression of Reunification Activists

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty and citizens of different circles held a rally outside Seoul Prison on August 12 denouncing the puppet authorities for their suppression of reunification activists.
					
					The participants bitterly condemned the ruling forces for throwing reunification activists behind bars.
					
					Rev. Han Sang Ryol, permanent advisor of the Solidarity for Progress, and other figures whom the authorities put in custody are not criminals, they said. They staged an action in demand of a meeting with them.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Prosecutor's Reckless Remarks Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Prosecutor's Reckless Remarks Slammed

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- A deputy spokesman for the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea in a commentary on August 12 denounced the puppet chief prosecutor's reckless remarks.
					
					That day Han Sang Dae, chief prosecutor, in his inaugural speech cried out for "eradicating pro-north leftist forces", the commentary recalled. 
					
					It condemned him for revealing his undisguised attempt to create a terror-ridden atmosphere of suppression even before a report on a hearing at the "National Assembly" was ready and receiving a writ of appointment.
					
					The chief executive is now under fire by different circles for having appointed his confidant as chief prosecutor in a bid to crack down on the opposition parties and progressive forces on the threshold of the next year's elections, it noted, adding that this is evidenced by the reckless remarks made by Han against this background.
					
					Whenever the security authorities cracked down on the democratic forces and progressive figures, they used the pretext of eliminating pro-north leftist forces.
					
					It urged the chief prosecutor to stop at once the coloring racket dating back to the old era.

articles.title: Action for Building Society for Workers Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action for Building Society for Workers Called for in S. Korea

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a press conference at the plaza of the Seoul City Office on August 11 at which it called upon the people from all walks of life to turn out in the action to build a new society where the workers have become its master.
					
					Speakers at the press conference deplored that the rights to assembly and demonstration, freedom of expression and right to job are being ruthlessly trampled down under the present "government".
					
					All the illegal acts and suppression are rampant in south Korea because the authorities are defending the big businessmen cracking down on workers and indicting members of teachers and government employees trade unions en masse, they charged.
					
					In order to bring about a new society, people from all walks of life should struggle in unity, they held.
					
					They urged the authorities to withdraw the reckless measure for lay-off against workers and stop the politically-motivated suppression.

articles.title: Settlement of Issue of Comfort Women for Imperial Japanese Army Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Settlement of Issue of Comfort Women for Imperial Japanese Army Demanded in S. Korea

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Members of south Korean civic and public organizations including the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers' Corps on August 12 demanded an immediate settlement of the issue of the comfort women for the imperial Japanese army.
					
					Dozens of years have passed since the victims who were forced into sexual slavery for the imperial Japanese army in the past testified to the crimes in which the Japanese imperialists imposed upon them painful wounds hardly healable in their lifetime and struggled in demand of the settlement of the issue of comfort women, they noted, and continued:
					
					Organizations of different circles and even international bodies have staged actions in demand of the substantial settlement of the issue such as the institution of a law requiring the Japanese government to make apology and reparation for the crimes related to comfort women and the prevention of the recurrence of similar ones.
					
					But the Japanese government has evaded its responsibility, instead of admitting its crimes.
					
					Victims are dying one after another with their grudges unsettled, they recalled, stressing the need to settle the issue of comfort women at an early date.
					
					They urged the Japanese Diet to institute the law at an early date and take measures to probe the truth about the crimes related to sexual slavery and make an apology and reparation for them.

articles.title: Songun Politics Praised by Regional Body
articles.content:
Songun Politics Praised by Regional Body

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions on August 10 posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "New theory of main force of revolution" on the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					The DPRK is reliably defending the socialist system despite the vicious moves of the imperialists to stifle it as it has the Songun politics, which puts forward the People's Army as the main force of revolution, and pushes forward the overall socialist construction by relying on it, the article said.
					
					On the basis of a scientific analysis of the change of the era and the relations of social classes, Kim Jong Il defined the People's Army as the core unit and main force of revolution in his work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution", the article noted.
					
					It went on:
					
					In the DPRK the People's Army is defending the party, revolution, country and the people in confrontation with imperialism and registering great achievements in the construction of major projects.
					
					Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership through his inspection of Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960.
					
					Historical experience proves that the Songun politics is, indeed, the most effective political mode which helps defeat any formidable enemy, overcome grim ordeals and difficulties and ensure the victorious advance of the revolutionary cause.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised as Benefactor of National Rebirth by Indian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised as Benefactor of National Rebirth by Indian Figure

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Suneet Chopra, a member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist) who is secretary general of the All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association, made public a statement on August 12 on the 66th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					August 15, 66 years ago, was the day when the Korean nation was freed from the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists by President Kim Il Sung, the statement said, and went on:
					
					It was thanks to the new spring of the national liberation the President brought by leading the hard-fought anti-Japanese war that the Korean nation was rescued and Korea, once eclipsed on the world map, could imposingly stand as the country of Juche and a socialist power.
					
					The Korean people are looking up to the President as an eternal benefactor of national rebirth and the great father.
					
					The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association will do its best to let the broad Indian public know about the immortal feats of the President who devoted his whole life to global independence.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Anti-DPRK Racket Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Anti-DPRK Racket Slammed

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association on August 11 issued a statement in support of the answer given by the head of the north side delegation to the north-south military working-level talks.
					
					Frightened at the normal blasting for the construction of a project for the improvement of the standard of people's living in South Hwanghae Province of the DPRK, the south Korean puppet military warmongers are misleading the public opinion that the army of the DPRK again shelled the waters near Yonphyong Island, the statement said, and went on:
					
					The false fabrication by the south Korean puppet military is a product of its deliberate scenario to chill the atmosphere of dialogue created in the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity recently and lead the inter-Korean relations to confrontation and conflict.
					
					The criminals who faked up the current case will face a stern judgment by all the fellow countrymen.
					
					We bitterly denounce the south Korean authorities for deliberately bedeviling the inter-Korean relations by kicking off the false racket slandering the DPRK.
					
					The south Korean authorities should stop at once such false racket and lend an ear to the voices of the world peace-loving forces aspiring after the peace and security of the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Maneuvers under Fire
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Maneuvers under Fire

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy issued a joint statement on Aug. 10 denouncing the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.
					
					Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises to be staged by the U.S. and south Korea are apparently a grave provocation against the DPRK, the statement said, branding them as a foolish attempt to stifle the socialist system in the DPRK by force.
					
					The exercises have nothing to do with "freedom" advertised by the U.S. but are aimed to expand its forces to the whole Korean Peninsula and, furthermore, secure hegemony over Asia-Pacific, it noted.
					
					It supported the Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army for sending an open letter to the U.S. and the south Korean authorities demanding them stop the joint military exercises. 
					
					It went on:
					
					If the U.S. is interested in peace on the Korean Peninsula, it should unconditionally stop the joint military exercises.
					
					We strongly demand the immediate withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea.
					
					We will always stand by the Korean people, the statement said, appealing to all the Juche idea and Songun idea followers of the world to unite more closely around socialist Korea of Juche.

articles.title: Japanese Politician Seeking Improvement of Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Japanese Politician Seeking Improvement of Relations with DPRK

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Tokuma Utsunomiya was one of the Japanese political activists who sought friendly relations between Japan and the DPRK.
					
					He visited Pyongyang for the first time in June Juche 53 (1964) to participate in an international seminar. Before arriving in Pyongyang, he was afraid that he and his companions would get a cold reception.
					
					But President Kim Il Sung, when receiving participants in the seminar, took Utsunomiya by the hand and said he was pleased to meet a guest from a neighboring country. He also said Japan and Korea were neighbors but it seemed they were as far away as the moon from each other for the lack of comings and goings.  
					
					Greatly touched by what he said, Utsunomiya went back to Japan and made much effort for the development of Japan-DPRK relations.
					
					Giving his impressions of the DPRK, he said:
					
					The economy of north Korea has become most thriving since the end of the June 25 war. It is a lie that north Korea can not rise from the ruins of war. The Kangson Steel Plant we visited is one of north Korea's major steel producers backing the country's heavy industry. Japan should pay attention to north Korea's economy and make exchange with the country. 
					
					His remark drew attention of the Japanese political and public circles.
					
					In May next year he, together with his colleagues, visited the DPRK and was honored with the audience of Kim Il Sung again.
					
					He told the President that he, a politician of Japan that oppressed the Korean people for many years, felt sorry for what it did. 
					
					But the President told the guest that he did not need to look back upon the past at the pleasant meeting. The President then said the two countries had many factors of good-neighbor relationship and if the Japanese government refrained from pursuing pro-U.S. policies, the DPRK and Japan, though they had different social systems, would live in peace and on good terms.
					
					Utsunomiya, deeply moved by his great magnanimity and personality, vowed to do his best for friendship between the Japanese and DPRK people.

articles.title: Earthquake Hits Japan
articles.content:
Earthquake Hits Japan

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- A 6-magnitude earthquake hit the Tohoku Area of Japan on August 12.
					
					The epicenter was 50 km deep in the waters off Fukushima Prefecture.

articles.title: Trade Deficit Increases in U.S.
articles.content:
Trade Deficit Increases in U.S.

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The U.S. deficit in global goods and services trade expanded 4.4 percent in June from the previous month to 53.07 billion dollars, the Commerce Department said Thursday.

articles.title: Cooperation among African Countries
articles.content:
Cooperation among African Countries

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Burundi and South Africa on August 11 signed five agreements on mutual cooperation in various fields including education, economy, sports and culture.
					
					On the same day Democratic Congo signed FTA of the Common Market for Eastern and Southern Africa.

articles.title: Democratic Congo Infected with Cholera
articles.content:
Democratic Congo Infected with Cholera

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Cholera has spread in Democratic Congo since July, infecting inhabitants.
					
					5 088 cholera cases occurred across the country and 296 cases among them died so far, according to survey data on August 10.
					
					The country is taking measures to prevent cholera from spreading.

articles.title: More NATO Soldiers Killed in Afghanistan
articles.content:
More NATO Soldiers Killed in Afghanistan

					Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- More NATO soldiers in Afghanistan met deaths due to the ceaseless attack of the resistance forces of the country.
					
					Two more NATO soldiers were killed on Thursday following an improvised explosive device (IED) attack in eastern Afghanistan.
					
					Two NATO soldiers were killed in southern Afghanistan on Friday.

articles.title: Cuba Develops Science and Technology
articles.content:
Cuba Develops Science and Technology

					Havana, August 15 (KCNA) -- Cuba is directing efforts to developing science and technology.
					
					There are 130 scientific research centers across the country at present.
					
					Scientific and technological researches are being intensified at universities. These help the country lay a firm foundation for further developing science and technology.

articles.title: Inaugurado Torneo Internacional de Tenis de Mesa por Invitacion
articles.content:
Inaugurado Torneo Internacional de Tenis de Mesa

					Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado en el capitalino Centro de Tenis de Mesa en el capitalino Reparto Chongchun el XXV Torneo Internacional de Tenis de Mesa por Invitacion de Pyongyang con la participacion de los jugadores de China, Rusia, Mongolia y Corea (grupos A y B).
					
					Este juego se organiza cada ano.
					
					La competencia, que tendra lugar hasta el dia 19, se realizara dividida en los partidos colectivos e individuales de ambos sexos y de doble mixto.
					
					En la ceremonia inaugural estuvieron presentes el titular de la Direccion de Rungnado, Pak Kyu Hong, quien es presidente de la Asociacion de Ping-Pong de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y otros funcionarios.
					
					Al termino del discurso inaugural, se realizaron los juegos colectivos de ambos sexos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun acusa al Sur de Corea de caudillo de ciberterrorismo
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun acusa al Sur de Corea de caudillo de ciberterrorismo

					Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- Hace poco, las autoridades policiales del Sur de Corea dieron a la publicidad el "resultado de investigacion conjunta" insistiendo en que los "hackers norcoreanos robaron ilegalmente los programas de videojuegos online". Y al mismo tiempo, difunden el rumor sobre el peligro de "ciberterrorismo del Norte" diciendo que "muchos hackers norcoreanos estan en terceros paises aprovechando los IP de esos paises". 
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este martes lo califica de un complot cinico para danar a la RPDC y justificar la campana conflictiva contra ella, y prosigue:
					
					En el tiempo pasado tambien los conservadores surcoreanos vinculaban con la RPDC los casos de hacking en el Sur de Corea, que ocurrian por los hackers surcoreanos o por la injerencia de un tercer pais. 
					
					El ciberterrorismo no tiene nada que ver con la RPDC. 
					
					Hace poco, bajo el rotulo de hacer frente al "ciberterrorismo" de alguien, el Ministerio de Defensa titere del Sur de Corea instalo la comandancia cibernetica con el fin de atacar con los medios tecnicos de punta a la RPDC en el "tiempo de emergencia" y aceleran activamente los preparativos de la guerra cibernetica formando en gran medida a los especialistas en esta rama. 
					
					Fueron precisamente los titeres surcoreanos que a principios del ano en curso desarrollaron un atentado cibernetico contra el Internet de la RPDC en ultramar. 
					
					Como vemos, el Sur de Corea es el caudillo del ciberterrorismo. 
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas desean la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas, deben parar sin demora las farsas groseras contra la RPDC y actuar con juicio.

articles.title: EE.UU. ampara ambicion de agresion a ultramar de Japon, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
EE.UU. ampara ambicion de agresion a ultramar de Japon, comenta ACNC

					Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Departamento de Estado de Estados Unidos publico oficialmente la posicion de anotar unicamente el Mar Este de Corea como el "Mar de Japon", lo cual provoca gran indignacion de los coreanos, siendo un proceder que ampara las maniobras de agresion a ultramar de Japon y denigra la dignidad nacional de la nacion coreana. 
					
					Como es conocido por todos, la nacion coreana vino utilizando durante largo tiempo el nombre del Mar Este de Corea.
					
					Desde la epoca remota, los antecedentes coreanos dieron primeros pasos de explotacion al Mar Este de Corea, alcanzando profundos conocimientos y comprension sobre esa zona maritima y denominaron antes que nadie el nombre del mar como el "Mar Este de Corea". 
					
					Lo comprueban los documentos historicos coreanos como "Historia de los Tres Reinos" y la lapida de la tumba del rey Kwanggaetho construida en el ano 414.
					
					Despues del siglo XIII, los geologos y exploradores occidentales tambien anotaron en los mapas mundiales el mar entre Corea y Japon como el "Mar Oriental", o sea "Mar  Este" y lo llamaron como "Mar de Corea". 
					
					Ese nombre, utilizado durante miles de anos por el pueblo coreano y reconocido internacionalmente, fue tergiversado por la ocupacion militar de Corea por parte de los imperialistas japoneses. 
					
					Los imperialistas japoneses ocuparon a Corea con la invencion del "Tratado de 5 Puntos de Ulsa" en 1905 y registraron en la Organizacion Internacional Hidrografica (OIH) el nombre del Mar Este de Corea como el "Mar de Japon" abusando de su posicion de metropoli en 1929.
					
					El hecho historico muestra claramente que el "Mar de Japon" es el nombre criminal que empezo a utilizarse con la agresion de Japon a Corea y es el producto de la politica expansionista de los militaristas japoneses. 
					
					EE.UU. da espaldas a esos datos historicos y a las costumbres y principios internacionales sobre la posesion y la anotacion del nombre de mar y coopera con Japon en registrar el nombre del Mar Este de Corea como el "Mar de Japon" antes de la Asamblea General de la OIH del ano proximo. De esta manera, instiga la ambicion de expansion territorial de Japon que se torna cada dia mas abierta en el nuevo siglo. 
					
					La posicion de EE.UU. sobre la anotacion separada del "Mar de Japon" hace recordar el "Convenio Taft-Katsura", documento bandolero en que hace 106 anos el imperio garantizo legalmente la ocupacion de Corea por parte de Japon. 
					
					Por el apoyo de EE.UU. en ese convenio, Japon pudo colonizar a Corea de manera violenta. 
					
					Provocara el repudio de la sociedad internacional el proceder de EE.UU. que coopera con Japon que hasta en el siglo nuevo abriga la ambicion de expansion territorial sin tener presente de la leccion de la historia.
